title: Die Dame mit dem Hündchen
description: “The Lady with the Dog” is a 1899 short story by Anton Chekhov. It is one of his most renowned and highly valued works. It tells a story of an adulterous affair between Dmitri Gurow, who is a bank worker from Moscow, and Anna Sergeyevna. Both of them are married and have arrived in an unnamed provincial city for a holiday. Despite the love they feel to each other, they have to part when the lady goes back home. However, Gurov fings himself unable to forget her even in his routine and searches for an opportunity to meer her.
author: Anton Chekhov
